pkgmetadata.longdescription: Idealisation of Patch Clamp Recordings // Allows for idealisation of patch clamp recordings by implementing the non-parametric JUmp Local dEconvolution Segmentation (JULES) filter, see F. Pein, I. Tecuapetla-Gmez, O. Schtte, C. Steinem, and A. Munk (2017) arXiv:1706.03671.
